title: Mechanical handling of traffic
creator_credit: British Railways and Southern Region Film Unit
brief_description: Mechanical aids to handling increasing amounts of goods and parcels leading to faster freight services on British Railways. Shows in some detail the various mechanical aids which speed up handling safety and efficiency in sheds, yards and stations.
